alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 4:48AM MST until January 05 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Pierce, Elk City, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Dixie, Lolo Pass, and Elk River. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
